entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1 except plus 3 over western sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1 except plus 3 over western sections. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
